definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Its core is formed by two hubs that have a five-ringed structure at their core.
sentences.chinese: 它的中心是由两枚以五环结构为核心的轮毂组成。

sentences.english: The aluminum wheel castings were pretty rough and hard to work with.
sentences.chinese: 该铝合金轮毂铸件的人相当粗糙和努力的工作。

sentences.english: Disk hub corrosion damages of a Beilun Power Plant's circulation pump were detected during the pump's overhaul.
sentences.chinese: 北仑电厂某机循泵在大修中发现轮毂腐蚀的缺陷。

sentences.english: Manufacturing 25 suits of hydraulic system of Hubcap Foundry Machine for Zhejiang Wangfeng Automobile Factory.
sentences.chinese: 为浙江万丰汽车制造25套轮毂重力铸造机液压系统。

sentences.english: In order to participate in the network, the spokes must implicitly trust the hub.
sentences.chinese: 为了加入网络，各个辐条必须隐式信任轮毂。

sentences.english: This research subject came form the development of In-Wheel-Motor for Motorized-wheels truck.
sentences.chinese: 该课题来源于电动汽车的轮毂电机的研制。

sentences.english: Based on the filling characteristics of LPDC wheel castings, a simplified mold filling simulation software was developed.
sentences.chinese: 针对轮毂铸件的充型特点，开发了简化充型模拟软件。

sentences.english: Control method of electronic differential of EV with four in-wheel motors;
sentences.chinese: 采用轮毂电机多轮驱动是电动汽车发展的新方向。

sentences.english: The hubs are connected by a rigid rod formed from carbon atoms, held together by triple bonds.
sentences.chinese: 轮毂连接着坚硬的碳原子制成的轴杆，由三面连接。

sentences.english: As an example, the forging of the second-generation hub bearing outer-ring is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以二代轮毂轴承外圈锻造为例进行模拟分析。

sentences.english: We are specialized in manufacturing brake drum, wheel hub and axle for Truck.
sentences.chinese: 本公司主营卡车刹车鼓，轮毂，车桥。

sentences.english: The characteristics and methods of automobile hubcap machining modeling are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了汽车轮毂模具加工建模特点和方法。

sentences.english: Two new spokes and a hub must be made.
sentences.chinese: 我必须重新做两根轮辐和一个轮毂。

sentences.english: Casted rims are much cheaper than forged rims due to the manufacturing process.
sentences.chinese: 轮毂是唯一要便宜得多，比伪造钢圈由于制造的过程。
森菲尔轮毂轴承的问题。

sentences.english: Not only is this complex, but it can result in an increased burden of security at the hub.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅复杂，还可能导致轮毂处的安全负担增加。

definition: empennage (of an aircraft)/fletching (of an arrow)/fins (of a missile, rocket etc)/rear spoiler (of a car)
